jsx.http.rpc.remote
Class Reflector

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.http.rpc.HttpRemote
          jsx.http.rpc.XMLHttpRemote
              jsx.http.rpc.remote.Remote
                  jsx.http.rpc.remote.RemoteReflector
                      jsx.http.rpc.remote.Reflector

public class Reflector
extends RemoteReflector

A base class of the client-side providers for remote reflect services.

Note that a client-side provider for remote reflect services is also a Remote object.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org
